name: Fizik (Fizik Game, LonelyToilet, Jaden Romilio)
description:
Fizik:

Fizik is a Neon First-Person Parkour Game that can be either Relaxing, Puzzling or Challenging depending on the simulation you decide to play. The player is empowered to beat their fastest time by mastering the mechanics and timing of their jumps. There are 3 different types of levels. 

Green levels are floaty, and allow the players to take their time to master their skills

Red levels are intense, claustrophobic levels that have a time limit. They require precision movement and quick reflexes to manoeuvre through the environment.

Key Features:

Wall-running

Grappling

Sliding

Bouncing

80+ Levels!

Collectable Orbs in each level

10 secret levels!

Controls: InputOutputWASDMovementSpaceJumpingLeft ShiftSprintingRight Mouse ClickGrappling Created By:

Jaden Romilio - Programmer

Jakob Houghton - Designer

Harry Mackenzie - Audio
